title: Texturing Cloth Simulation
description: In this two part coding challenge, I cover the beginShape(), endShape(), and texture() functions and discuss different options like TRIANGLE_STRIP, QUAD_STRIP, and more. Then, I demonstrate how to render geometry with an image texture (making a waving flag) using the Toxiclibs physics library. Toxiclibs can now be downloaded from Processing's library manager
